data.title: Excellent Crystals. One of the best in Fla
data.text: A Diverse selection of Crystals and related items. Easy to find. Pleasant, knowledgeable staff.  I found about any stone you might want, and lamps and jewelry.

data.title: Nice Selection
data.text: For a seaside town, I expected more variety of metaphysical options.  This location had enough to make the visit worth it.  Books, music, jewelry, healing supplies, art, and a crystal light bed and meditation room.  I would visit again.

data.title: Awesome Assortment of Books, Merchandise,  & Classes
data.text: I love this shop! I have purchased alot of merchandise from here. Their stone & crystals  are exquisite,  their jewelry beautiful, and this place has great energy.  The staff is friendly and helpful. There are healing & meditation rooms. They do classes, and  psychic readings. Please visit!
